articles.title: 'They were trying to drag me out of the bed': Man recalls 'strange encounters' in ICU after open-heart surgery - AsiaOne
articles.description: It's probably safe to say the intensive care unit (ICU) is a place most of us hope to never land in. One former patient shared his uncomfortable two-day experience in an ICU ward at a local hospital following his open heart surgery — but not for reasons you m…
articles.content:
It's probably safe to say the intensive care unit (ICU) is a place most of us hope to never land in.
One former patient shared his uncomfortable two-day experience in an ICU ward at a local hospital… [+2597 chars]
